Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored the opening goal for France in the 1st minute
Federico Dimarco scored for Italy in the 30th minute
Davide Frattesi scored for Italy in the 51st minute
Giacomo Raspadori scored for Italy in the 74th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Italy staged a remarkable comeback to defeat France 3-1 in their UEFA Nations League A Group 2 opener on Friday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Parc des Princes in Paris, France
